concept.title: Examples of single-length keys in one form only

titlealts.navtitle: Examples of single-length keys in one form only
titlealts.searchtitle: (): Examples of single-length keys in one form only

conbody.codeblock:
Key Key Form 1
OP DATA or data. Use or to send encrypted key to another cryptograpic partner. Then communicate the ciphertext. OP MAC . Because no MACVER key exists, there is no secure communication of the MAC with another cryptographic partner. IM DATA , and then or . Then to communicate ciphertext and key with another cryptographic partner. EX DATA You can send this key to a cryptographic partner, but you can do nothing with it directly. Use it for the key distribution service. The partner could then use to get it in operational form, and use it as in OP DATA above.
